mapper.insert: insert into users(email, password, nickname, image_url, provider, provider_id, verified, created_at) values (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{imageUrl}, #{provider}, #{providerId}, #{verified}, now() )
mapper.select: select * from users where provider=#{provider} and provider_id=#{providerId}
mapper.update: update users set password=#{password} where email=#{email}
